Package appdriver

Class CustAcctMgmt

  • java.lang.Object
    • appdriver.CustAcctMgmt
  • public class CustAcctMgmt
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is works as bridge between App and Inner modules of the system It is associated with CustomerManager and AccountManager via composition.
    Author:
    nitishsharma
